title: Sabbat Worlds
description: Across the Sabbat Worlds, a bitter conflict is fought, a conflict that can only end in victory or annihilation. The innumerable forces of the Archenemy attack without mercy, and planet after planet burns with the flames of war. This anthology opens the gateway to the Sabbat Worlds like never before, featuring new stories from some of the Black Libraryâ€™s best-known authors including Dan Abnett, Graham McNeill, Aaron Dembski-Bowden and many more.
author: Dan Abnett
